label: R Server Only SQL Server 2016 Enterprise
displayName: R Server Only SQL Server 2016 Enterprise
summary: R Server Only SQL Server 2016 Enterprise
description: This image of SQL Server 2016 Enterprise (version 9.0.1) edition has been pre-configured with Microsoft R Server (Standalone) installation. Microsoft R Server (Standalone) provides the option to develop high performance R solutions on Windows while connecting to the database or data source of your choice. This image is charged exactly like SQL Server 2016 Enterprise image, but it contains no Database elements and has the core ScaleR and DeployR functionality optimized for Windows environments. For production workloads we recommend that you use a virtual machine size of DS4 or higher.
